Title: "I'm blind, not deaf!" - A Terrorblade Guide [6.80]

ItemTooltips.slippers: You can get a Gauntlet of Strength instead if you're worried about survavibility in the early laning.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Will save your life in many situations.
ItemTooltips.poor_mans_shield: You can get a Ring of Aquila instead if your support doesn't build Basilius. It's up to you.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: If your team doesn't have any disables and if you've got the gold to afford it.
ItemTooltips.necronomicon: If you want to assume a heavy-pushing role. This item and Manta Style makes tower melt like butter.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Terrorblade doesn't really have escape abilities or ways to cope with stuns, BKB is a great item if you face a disable-heavy team.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: If you miss a lot of attacks or if you simply can afford it, get this.
ItemTooltips.butterfly: Standard item for agility carries, this is the item slot you can replace by BKB / Hex / MKB if you feel like it.
ItemTooltips.manta: Pop this preferably when you're under Metamorphosis. Great for teamfights & pushing towers.
ItemTooltips.sange_and_yasha: Some people prefer that item over Manta, I don't recommend it for this build though.
ItemTooltips.satanic: The best orb effect on Terrorblade, period. With this and Sunder you will never visit your fountain again.
ItemTooltips.skadi: Skadi + Lifesteal stacks, which makes for an OP combo.
ItemTooltips.helm_of_the_dominator: Lifesteal is arguably the best orb effect on TB. Component of a later Sanatic.
ItemTooltips.orb_of_venom: This and Yasha will allow you to prevent anyone from running from you.
